content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0)
Consists of steam engine (position 0), boiler (position 1), and offshore pump (position 2).

### Copper plate mine at position(3)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 3) and a furnace at position(4).
- Burner mining drill (position 5) and a furnace at position(6).
- Burner mining drill (position 7) and a furnace at position(8).

### Copper cable factory at position(9)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position(10) and inserter at position(11) that puts into the assembling machine.
- Beltgroup (position 12) that connects the furnace at position 4 to the assembling machine at position 10.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough raw materials in your inventory to craft the desired item. For example, to craft iron gear wheels, you need iron plates, which must be smelted in a furnace.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for occupied tiles in the vicinity.

### Errors when crafting without a crafting machine or furnace
- Verify that you are using a crafting machine or furnace for recipes that require them.
